headings.usage: Use for all section headers, hero titles, and card titles. Avoid Inter for headings.

body.usage: Use for all paragraph text, labels, and data entries.

mono.usage: Use for credit card numbers, transaction IDs, and code snippets.

gradients.card_glow: radial-gradient(circle at top left, rgba(99, 102, 241, 0.15), transparent 70%)

buttons.primary: bg-primary hover:bg-primary/90 text-white shadow-lg shadow-primary/20 transition-all duration-300 hover:scale-[1.02] active:scale-[0.98]
buttons.secondary: bg-white/10 hover:bg-white/20 text-white border border-white/10 backdrop-blur-sm transition-all duration-300

cards.base: bg-card text-card-foreground rounded-2xl border border-border/50 shadow-sm overflow-hidden relative group

inputs.base: bg-white/5 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-primary/20 text-white placeholder:text-gray-500 rounded-xl h-12

accessibility.contrast: Ensure text has at least 4.5:1 contrast ratio against background.
accessibility.focus: Visible focus rings on all interactive elements (ring-2 ring-primary/50).
accessibility.aria: Use aria-labels for icon-only buttons and decorative images.

media.icons: Use Lucide React icons (default) or Phosphor Icons for a more premium feel.

3d_libraries.usage: Use Framer Motion for layout transitions and Recharts for data visualization. Avoid heavy 3D libraries unless necessary for the hero section.

instructions_to_main_agent: Implement a 'Dark Mode First' approach. The default theme is dark.
Use the 'Outfit' font for headings to give a modern, tech-forward feel.
Apply glassmorphism effects to dashboard cards to create depth.
Use the provided image URLs for the hero section and credit card visuals.
Ensure all interactive elements have hover and active states.
Follow the 'Bento' grid layout for the dashboard overview.
Do not use the forbidden colors (#7351B7 for AI page, #1B93A4 for Dashboard).
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur).
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters for icons.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors, selection states, and loading animations.
Prioritize using pre-existing components from src/components/ui when applicable.
